alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 3:06PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ONONDAGA COUNTY... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 305 PM EST, a lake effect snow band was along a line extending from near Brewerton to near Syracuse. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Syracuse, Clay, Cicero, De Witt, Lysander, Van Buren, Baldwinsville, North Syracuse, Solvay, and Manlius. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 39. New York Interstate 81 near 16A, and between 17 and 31. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
